content: These drinks sound amazing! I think I'll try the Cucumber Lime Refresher and the Watermelon Basil Cooler. They sound so refreshing and perfect for a summer BBQ. I'll definitely make sure to have plenty of ice on hand. By the way, speaking of summer and BBQs, I was just thinking about our annual family picnic in June, and how much fun we had. We had a big potluck, and I made my famous mac and cheese, which was a hit with the kids. Do you have any other tips on how to keep drinks cold at an outdoor BBQ?
